rules_text:
When Klaxular Architects enters the battlefield, you may discard a card. If you don't, choose one. If you do, choose both.
• Warpjump. [i](You may reveal and cast an Interstellar card you own from outside the game.)[/i]
• Create a Treasure token. [i](It's an artifact with “{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.”)[/i]
